message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this valuable product for $14,000. I believe it will be a great asset to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I've given it some thought and am willing to increase my offer to $12,500.
